com.xing.api.data.profile

Class Company

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.xing.api.data.profile.Company
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    java.io.Serializable

    public class Company
extends java.lang.Object
implements java.io.Serializable
    Java representation of a company object. This model is primiraly present in a user's professional experience field as a primary_company or a list of pass companies. See XingUser for more info.
    See Also:
    User Profile Resource, Serialized Form
